brand.$description: Static color to be used in the brand relevant UI elements.

no_color.$description: Static value when no color respectively 0% opacity is needed. References primitive transparent token.

unselected.$description: Semantic Interaction color for not selected items. Used in Main Navigation, Navigation Tree, Tabs.

first.$description: Primary shadow color for UI elements. 1st of 2 shadow effects.

second.$description: Secondary shadow color for UI elements. 2nd of 2 shadow effects.
